text: I'm about to enjoy a call toughest style
chai on the streets now Calcutta is a
very loud and you can hear a lot of
honking and a lot of traffic in the city
but one of the joys of the city is being
able to stop on the side of the street
and drink a cup of chai and uniquely
Calcutta and they serve it in little
clay little clay cups I got the large
size which is six six rupees for this
cup but they also have a smaller size
just for four rupees and it's filled
with chai
it's piping hot it's not too sweet it's
spiced a little bit with masala spice
and that's that's delicious that's just
a nice way to relax on the street here
in Calcutta and serve in a in a little
clay cup after you're finished with the
tea you just throw it in the into the
garbage and they they give you a new one
every time you you order
very nice very cool one of the one of
the really cool things about Calcutta
